title: Bug 23787 [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787 [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On the Project Properties Info page, the fields for path, type, and other information are displayed as text fields.
EB: On the Project Properties Info page, the fields for path, type, and other information should be displayed as labels instead of text fields.
SR: To reproduce the bug, select a Project, right-click, choose Properties, and navigate to the subsequent Info page. The fields for path, type, etc. should be displayed as readonly labels instead of text fields.
